profile.aboutMe: I’m Mohammad Habib, a Front-End Developer with over two years of experience using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, Tailwind CSS with a strong focus on building high-quality, responsive user interfaces and exceptional UI/UX.
profile.profilText: I’m Mohammad Habib, a dedicated Front-End Developer with 2+ years of experience in the industry, specialized in building modern, scalable, and visually stunning web applications.
profile.skillsText: I specialize in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, leveraging the power of React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to create seamless and interactive digital experiences.
